mapper.select: SELECT sale_num FROM room_sale ORDER BY reg_date DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_sale(sale_num, reg_date, sdate, edate, total_price, coupon_price, point_price, discount, final_price, name, detail_num, user_num ) VALUES(#{sale_num}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{sdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{edate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{total_price} , 0 , #{point_price} , #{discount} , #{final_price} , #{name} , #{detail_num} , #{user_num} )
INSERT INTO room_pay_cash(sale_num, imp_uid, card_name , card_num) VALUES(#{sale_num}, #{imp_uid}, #{card_name} , #{card_num} )
mapper.select: select card_name , card_num from room_pay_cash where sale_num = #{sale_num}
mapper.insert: insert into Room_refund(sale_num , refund_state , refund_date, refund_price , card_num , refund_reason , user_num) values(#{sale_num} , 1 , sysdate , #{refund_preice} , #{card_num} , #{refund_reason} , #{user_num})
